titleStmt.title: A most godly and very necessarie lesson to be learned of all christen men and womẽ, before they come to y[e] Communion of the the bodie & bloud of our sauiour Christe Jesus. Compiled by Richard Tracie. Anno .M.D.xlviii..
titleStmt.author: Tracy, Richard, d. 1569.

publicationStmt.publisher: by John Day and Wyllyam Seres, dwellynge in Sepulchres Parish at the signe of the Resurrection a little aboue Holbourne Conduite.,

notesStmt.note: Signatures: first 4 leaves unsigned, A₂₋₈ B⁸, last leaf unmarked.
Incomplete copy from Bodleian Library found identified as STC 24163a at reel 1397:11.
Imperfect: print show-through; incomplete copy (first four leaves only) found at reel 1397:11.
Reproductions of originals in: Bodleian Library (reel 1397:11) and Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 2142:12).

place.placeName: Sepulchres Parish at the signe of the Resurrection a little aboue Holbourne Conduite.
